result.eng: Thanks be to God.
result.ga: a bhuí le dia
result.orig: a bhuí le dia
result.html: a bhuí le diaThanks be to God.
result.ponchtml: a ḃuí le diaThanks be to God.

result.eng: O God, why did you abandon me?
result.ga: a dhia cén fáth ar thréig tú mé
result.orig: a dhia cén fáth ar thréig tú mé
result.html: a dhia cén fáth ar thréig tú méO God, why did you abandon me?
result.ponchtml: a ḋia cén fáṫ ar ṫréig tú méO God, why did you abandon me?

result.eng: Oh my God, I'm pregnant!
result.ga: a dhia tá mé ag iompar clainne
result.orig: a dhia tá mé ag iompar clainne
result.html: a dhia tá mé ag iompar clainneOh my God, I'm pregnant!
result.ponchtml: a ḋia tá mé ag iompar clainneOh my God, I'm pregnant!

result.eng: Do you believe in God?
result.ga: an gcreideann tú ar dhia
result.orig: an gcreideann tú ar dhia
result.html: an gcreideann tú ar dhiaDo you believe in God?
result.ponchtml: an gcreideann tú ar ḋiaDo you believe in God?

result.eng: That is the word of God.
result.ga: sin briathar dé
result.orig: sin briathar dé
result.html: sin briathar déThat is the word of God.
result.ponchtml: sin briaṫar déThat is the word of God.

result.eng: I am still healthy, thanks God.
result.ga: buíochas le dia tá mo shláinte fós agam
result.orig: buíochas le dia tá mo shláinte fós agam
result.html: buíochas le dia tá mo shláinte fós agamI am still healthy, thanks God.
result.ponchtml: buíoċas le dia tá mo ẛláinte fós agamI am still healthy, thanks God.

result.eng: Glory be to God and his only son, Jesus Christ.
result.ga: glóir do dhia is dá aonmhac Íosa críost
result.orig: glóir do dhia is dá aonmhac Íosa críost
result.html: glóir do dhia is dá aonmhac Íosa críostGlory be to God and his only son, Jesus Christ.
result.ponchtml: glóir do ḋia is dá aonṁac Íosa críostGlory be to God and his only son, Jesus Christ.

result.eng: In the name of God!
result.ga: in ainm dé
result.orig: in ainm dé
result.html: in ainm déIn the name of God!
result.ponchtml: in ainm déIn the name of God!

result.eng: That is the word of God.
result.ga: sin briathar dé
result.orig: sin briathar dé
result.html: sin briathar déThat is the word of God.
result.ponchtml: sin briaṫar déThat is the word of God.

result.eng: The pub is still open, thanks God.
result.ga: tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le dia
result.orig: tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le dia
result.html: tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíochas le diaThe pub is still open, thanks God.
result.ponchtml: tá an pub fós ar oscailt buíoċas le diaThe pub is still open, thanks God.

result.eng: Hello [literally, "God to you"].
result.ga: dia dhuit
result.orig: dia dhuit
result.html: dia dhuitHello [literally, "God to you"].
result.ponchtml: dia ḋuitHello [literally, "God to you"].

result.eng: Hello [literally, "God and Mary to you"].
result.ga: dia is muire dhuit
result.orig: dia is muire dhuit
result.html: dia is muire dhuitHello [literally, "God and Mary to you"].
result.ponchtml: dia is muire ḋuitHello [literally, "God and Mary to you"].

result.eng: God bless you.
result.ga: bail ó dhia oraibh
result.orig: bail ó dhia oraibh
result.html: bail ó dhia oraibhGod bless you.
result.ponchtml: bail ó ḋia oraiḃGod bless you.

result.eng: I am well, thanks be to God.
result.ga: tá mé go maith buíochas le dia
result.orig: tá mé go maith buíochas le dia
result.html: tá mé go maith buíochas le diaI am well, thanks be to God.
result.ponchtml: tá mé go maiṫ buíoċas le diaI am well, thanks be to God.

result.eng: The ten of them are still alive, thank God.
result.ga: tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le dia
result.orig: tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le dia
result.html: tá an deichniúr acu fós beo buíochas le diaThe ten of them are still alive, thank God.
result.ponchtml: tá an deiċniúr acu fós beo buíoċas le diaThe ten of them are still alive, thank God.

result.eng: Her husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ga: cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht dé leis
result.orig: cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht dé leis
result.html: cailleadh a fear céile go tobann anuraidh beannacht dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.
result.ponchtml: cailleaḋ a fear céile go tobann anuraiḋ beannaċt dé leisHer husband died suddenly last year, God have mercy on him.

result.eng: God bless the work.
result.ga: bail ó dhia ar an obair
result.orig: bail ó dhia ar an obair
result.html: bail ó dhia ar an obairGod bless the work.
result.ponchtml: bail ó ḋia ar an obairGod bless the work.

result.eng: I'll see you on Friday night, God willing.
result.ga: feicfidh mé oíche aoine thú le cúnamh dé
result.orig: feicfidh mé oíche aoine thú le cúnamh dé
result.html: feicfidh mé oíche aoine thú le cúnamh déI'll see you on Friday night, God willing.
result.ponchtml: feicfiḋ mé oíċe aoine ṫú le cúnaṁ déI'll see you on Friday night, God willing.

result.eng: Hello. [literally, God to you]
result.ga: dia duit
result.orig: dia duit
result.html: dia duitHello. [literally, God to you]
result.ponchtml: dia duitHello. [literally, God to you]

result.eng: Hello to you too. [response to a hello; literally, God and Mary to you]
result.ga: dia is muire duit
result.orig: dia is muire duit
result.html: dia is muire duitHello to you too. [response to a hello; literally, God and Mary to you]
result.ponchtml: dia is muire duitHello to you too. [response to a hello; literally, God and Mary to you]

result.eng: Those of you who fear God.
result.ga: sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla dé
result.orig: sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla dé
result.html: sibhse ar a bhfuil eagla déThose of you who fear God.
result.ponchtml: siḃse ar a ḃfuil eagla déThose of you who fear God.

result.eng: Until next week, good-bye and God bless.
result.ga: go dtí an tseachtain seo chugainn slán agus beannacht
result.orig: go dtí an tseachtain seo chugainn slán agus beannacht
result.html: go dtí an tseachtain seo chugainn slán agus beannachtUntil next week, good-bye and God bless.
result.ponchtml: go dtí an tseaċtain seo ċugainn slán agus beannaċtUntil next week, good-bye and God bless.

result.eng: They thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ga: ghabh siad buíochas le dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.orig: ghabh siad buíochas le dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.html: ghabh siad buíochas le dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ponchtml: ġaḃ siad buíoċas le dia as iad a ṫaḃairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.

result.eng: The skills of musicians are gifts from God.
result.ga: is buanna ó dhia na scileanna atá ag lucht ceoil
result.orig: is buanna ó dhia na scileanna atá ag lucht ceoil
result.html: is buanna ó dhia na scileanna atá ag lucht ceoilThe skills of musicians are gifts from God.
result.ponchtml: is buanna ó ḋia na scileanna atá ag luċt ceoilThe skills of musicians are gifts from God.
